title: Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black (Packaging May Vary)
descriptions:
**Wake Up to the Aroma of Freshly Brewed Coffee with the Sleek Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker**

Transform your morning routine into a blissful coffee experience with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker! Designed for coffee lovers who appreciate convenience without compromising on quality, this elegant black coffee maker is the perfect addition to any kitchen countertop.

**Compact Size, Powerful Features:**
- The Keurig K-Compact's slim 8-inch width makes it an ideal fit for any space, leaving you more room for your favorite coffee mug collection.
- Despite its compact size, this machine boasts robust features that make brewing your beloved cup of Joe a breeze.

**Customize Your Coffee Experience:**
- Indulge in the luxury of choice with three different brew sizes (6, 8, and 10 oz), ensuring your coffee is just as strong or mild as you prefer.
- Enjoy your favorite brew in under a minute, giving you more time to savor each sip or tackle your busy day.

**Convenience at Your Fingertips:**
- The large 36 oz water reservoir is removable, making refills and cleaning effortless.
- Simple button controls guide you through the brewing process with ease â€“ it's foolproof coffee-making at its finest.

**Eco-Friendly and Energy-Efficient:**
- With the auto-off feature that activates after 2 hours, you can save energy and enjoy peace of mind as you head out the door.

**Versatile and Practical Design:**
- A removable drip tray not only makes for easy cleaning but also accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches tall, so your coffee can always be on-the-go.
- In the event of an accidental brew, the drip tray can hold a full mishap, keeping your counters pristine and coffee-waste free.

**Hot Water at Your Command:**
- Need hot water for tea, oatmeal, or a quick meal? The hot water dispense feature has you covered, adding even more convenience to your day.

**Compatibility for All Tastes:**
- This coffee maker is compatible with all K-Cup pod varieties, giving you an endless array of flavors and strengths to explore.
- While not compatible with the My K-Cup Universal Reusable Coffee Filter, you'll still have a world of coffee to discover with the vast selection of K-Cup pods.

**Please Note:**
- Packaging may vary, but the quality and elegance of the Keurig K-Compact remain consistent.

Embark on a journey of exquisite taste and effortless brewing with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. It's more than just a coffee machine; it's a gateway to your perfect morning, every morning.

Experience the ultimate convenience in brewing your favorite cup of coffee with the sleek Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. Designed to fit perfectly in any kitchen, this compact powerhouse stands just 8 inches wide, ready to serve up the rich, smooth, and delicious coffee you love, one cup at a time.

**Key Features:**

- **Multiple Brew Sizes:** Choose from three cup sizes - 6, 8, or 10 oz. - to get the strength and quantity that's just right for you.
- **Quick Brew Time:** In a rush? No problem! Your coffee brews in under a minute, so you're only moments away from your morning pick-me-up or an afternoon refresh.
- **Removable Water Reservoir:** The 36 oz. water tank is easily detachable, simplifying the refill process and making it a breeze to maintain.
- **Energy Efficient:** With the auto-off feature that activates after 2 hours, this coffee maker conserves energy, giving you peace of mind and an eco-friendly option.
- **Smart Start:** Your coffee maker heats and brews in one simple processâ€”no need to wait for it to heat before selecting your cup size.
- **Convenience at Your Fingertips:** Intuitive button controls make your brewing experience stress-free and straightforward.
- **Travel Mug Friendly:** The removable drip tray accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches tall and holds a full accidental brew for easy cleanup.
- **Hot Water On Demand:** Whether you need hot water for instant soups or oatmeal, this feature adds to the versatility of your coffee maker.
- **K-Cup Pod Compatibility:** Enjoy a wide variety of K-Cup pod varieties or use the Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter for your own ground coffee (filter sold separately).

With the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, you're not just buying a coffee machine; you're unlocking a world of coffee enjoyment with convenience and style. Whether you're gearing up for the day ahead or winding down, your perfect cup is always ready when you are. Please note that packaging may vary, but the quality and craftsmanship you expect from Keurig remain the same. Get yours today and elevate your coffee experience to new heights!

Wake up to the simplicity of a perfect brew with the sleek Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. Your mornings deserve the rich, smooth, and aromatic coffee that this compact and stylish black beauty can provide in the comfort of your own home.

**Effortless Brewing at Your Fingertips!**
Choose from three convenient cup sizes (6, 8, or 10 oz.) to suit your taste and get your ideal coffee, tea, or hot cocoa ready in under a minute. The user-friendly button controls make selecting your size and brewing a breeze, all while enjoying the Smart Start feature that heats and brews in one simple process. No more waiting for the machine to heat before selecting your cup size!

**Thoughtful Design for the Modern Home**
At just 8 inches wide, the Keurig K-Compact fits snugly on any countertop, making it the perfect space-saving solution for your kitchen, office, or dorm room. The 36-ounce water reservoir is removable for easy refilling and cleaning, ensuring fresh, delicious beverages every time.

**Convenience Meets Versatility**
The removable drip tray not only simplifies cleanup but also accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches tall, making it your perfect on-the-go partner. Did you accidentally start a brew? No worries! The drip tray has the capacity to hold a full accidental brew, keeping messes to a minimum.

**Sustainability and Energy Efficiency**
Featuring an automatic off function, the Keurig K-Compact conserves energy by turning off 2 hours after your last brew. Enjoy peace of mind and savings on your electricity bill while indulging in your caffeine fix.

**Hot Water on Demand**
Craving a quick cup of oatmeal or a soothing cup of tea? The hot water dispense feature is at your service, providing hot water for all your needs with the press of a button.

**Compatibility for Coffee Lovers**
Whether you love experimenting with various K-Cup pod varieties or prefer to use your own coffee with the My K-Cup Universal Reusable Coffee Filter, this machine is designed to cater to any preference (Note: My K-Cup Filter not included).

**Flexible and Reliable**
With packaging that may vary, the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker is always ready to meet your coffee needs with consistent quality and taste.

Transform your coffee experience with the Keurig K-Compact. Quick, convenient, and customizable â€“ it's the single-serve coffee maker that adapts to your lifestyle, one delicious cup at a time.

Wake up to the rich, pure taste of a freshly brewed beverage with the sleek and efficient Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. Designed to impress, this coffee maker is a stylish addition to any kitchen with its classic black finish and compact 8-inch width that fits comfortably in any space.

Key features of the Keurig K-Compact Coffee Maker include:

- **Quick Brew Time**: Enjoy your favorite hot beverage in under a minute, perfect for those busy mornings or when you need an instant pick-me-up.
- **Customizable Cup Sizes**: Choose from three brewing sizes (6, 8, or 10 oz) to get your coffee strength just the way you like it.
- **Large Water Reservoir**: The 36 oz removable water tank means fewer refills and more convenient brewing.
- **Smart Start**: Your coffee maker heats and brews in one simple process â€“ no need to wait for it to heat before selecting your cup size.
- **Intuitive Button Controls**: Simple button interface for effortless brewing.
- **Energy Efficient**: Auto-off feature turns off your coffee maker 2 hours after the last brew, saving energy.
- **Travel Mug Friendly**: The removable drip tray accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches tall and holds a full accidental brew for easy cleanup.
- **Hot Water on Demand**: Need hot water for a quick meal or a cup of tea? Dispense hot water with the touch of a button.
- **K-Cup Pod Versatility**: Compatible with all K-Cup pod varieties, brew your favorite coffee, tea, hot cocoa, and more.
- **Exclusively Compatible with Keurig Accessories**: While not compatible with the My K-Cup Universal Reusable Coffee Filter, enjoy a range of K-Cup pods and Keurig accessories for the perfect brewing experience.

Please note that packaging may vary, but the quality and care you expect from Keurig remain unchanged.

The Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker is the perfect brewer for anyone looking for convenience, versatility, and a delicious cup of coffee or hot beverage at the touch of a button. Bring home this essential kitchen companion today and savor the simplicity of great taste every day!

Wake up to the perfect cup of coffee every single day with the sleek and efficient Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. Designed with a sophisticated black finish that complements any kitchen decor, this compact coffee maker is a must-have for coffee enthusiasts and busy professionals alike.

Wake up to the rich, pure taste of coffee with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. This sleek black beauty is the perfect addition to any kitchen, office, or dorm room. With a slim width of just 8 inches, it fits comfortably anywhere, saving you precious counter space without compromising on quality.

Imagine your favorite coffee, brewed to perfection in under a minute! Whether you prefer a mild 6 oz., a standard 8 oz., or a strong 10 oz. cup, the Keurig K-Compact has you covered. The 36 oz. removable water reservoir means you can brew multiple cups before needing a refill, making your morning routine or entertaining guests a breeze.

Smart Start technology heats and brews in one simple process, eliminating waiting for the water to warm up. With intuitive button controls, brewing your perfect cup is as easy as pressing a button. Plus, the energy-efficient auto-off feature ensures the coffee maker turns off two hours after the last brew, saving energy and giving you peace of mind.

Spills and splashes? No problem! The removable drip tray not only captures any accidental brews but also accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches tall, so you can take your coffee to-go without a hitch. And when you need a quick hot water fix, the hot water dispense function is at your service for oatmeal, soups, or tea.

The Keurig K-Compact is not only compatible with all the K-Cup pod varieties but also with the Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter (sold separately), offering you the freedom to brew your own ground coffee.

**Wake Up to the Perfect Cup with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker**

Start your morning right with the sleek and efficient Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. Designed to fit any kitchen or office, this slim and stylish coffee maker in classic black delivers your favorite beverages with ease and speed. 

**Quick Brew Technology** - Enjoy your cherished coffee flavors in no time! With a brewing time of under a minute, the Keurig K-Compact allows you to select from three cup sizes (6, 8, or 10 oz.) and makes your morning routine smoother than ever.

**Space-Saving Design** - At just 8 inches wide, this compact powerhouse is perfect for small countertops, leaving you ample space for all your coffee fixings.

**Large Water Reservoir** - The 36 oz. water reservoir is both ample and removable, making it a breeze to refill and clean, ensuring you can brew multiple cups before needing a top-up.

**Smart Start** - Your coffee machine heats and brews in one simple process. No need to wait for it to heat before selecting your cup size, making your brewing process seamless and straightforward.

**Intuitive Button Controls** - Simple button controls make it easy to brew your perfect cup every time.

**Energy Efficient** - With an auto-off feature that turns off your coffee maker 2 hours after the last brew, you'll save energy without sacrificing convenience.

**Travel Mug Friendly** - The removable drip tray accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches tall and holds a full accidental brew for easy cleanup.

**Hot Water on Demand** - Need hot water for tea, hot cocoa, or instant meals? The hot water dispense feature ensures you have hot water whenever you need it, without the wait.

**K-Cup Pod Versatility** - Choose from hundreds of delicious K-Cup pod varieties or use the Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter (sold separately) to brew your favorite ground coffee.

Whether you're craving a bold dark roast to jump-start your day, a soothing herbal tea before bed, or anything in between, the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker is the perfect companion for your beverage needs. Please note, packaging may vary, but the quality and performance you expect from Keurig remain constant.

**Get your Keurig K-Compact today and savor the simplicity of great coffee, cup after delightful cup!**
